description: The underwater research facility was once a state-of-the-art laboratory for studying the unique marine life and ecosystems of the deep ocean. However, after years of neglect and abandonment, it has become a treacherous maze of twisted corridors and dark chambers. The walls are covered in coral, anemones, and glowing jellyfish, casting eerie shadows on the floor. Water leaks from the cracked pipes, creating small pools that reflect the faint light filtering through the grimy windows. The air is thick with the stench of decay and rotting fish.

rooms.description: The entrance to the facility lies at the bottom of a rickety staircase, which descends from the surface into the darkness. Water drips steadily onto the stone floor, echoing through the chamber.
rooms.passages: Staircase leads down to this room; passageway to Room 2

items.name: Old Maintenance Logbook
items.description: A dusty logbook detailing the maintenance and repair work done on the facility's systems. The last entry is dated several years ago.
properties: A hidden compartment containing a waterproof map of the surrounding area
Flickering fluorescent light overhead
Cracked pipes leak water onto the floor

rooms.description: A narrow corridor lined with rusted pipes and flickering emergency lights. The walls are covered in algae, giving off a faint glow.
rooms.passages: Staircase from Room 1; passageway to Room 3

items.name: Emergency Oxygen Cylinder
items.description: A partially used oxygen cylinder that may still have some air left inside.
properties: May be useful for breathing
Slightly warmer temperature than the rest of the facility
Faint smell of disinfectant in the air

rooms.description: A small chamber filled with rows of old computer terminals and dusty filing cabinets. The walls are adorned with faded motivational posters.
rooms.passages: Corridor from Room 2; passageway to Room 4

items.name: Old Security Console
items.description: A functioning security console that may still have some access to the facility's internal systems.
properties: May be able to hack into the system
Small storage room for equipment
Air conditioning unit humming in the corner

rooms.description: A cramped laboratory filled with old equipment and biological samples. The walls are covered in strange symbols and diagrams.
rooms.passages: Corridor from Room 3; passageway to Room 5

items.name: Biological Specimen Jar
items.description: A jar containing a strange, glowing creature that may be of interest to scientists.
properties: May be useful for studying or selling
Faint smell of disinfectant and formaldehyde
Small freezer unit humming in the corner

rooms.description: A large, dimly lit chamber filled with rows of old research equipment. The walls are adorned with diagrams and equations.
rooms.passages: Laboratory from Room 4; passageway to Room 6

items.name: Old Research Notes
items.description: A stack of dusty research notes detailing experiments on the glowing creatures.
properties: May be useful for understanding the creatures
Small storage room for equipment
Flickering fluorescent light overhead

rooms.description: A narrow corridor lined with old pipes and flickering emergency lights. The walls are covered in algae, giving off a faint glow.
rooms.passages: Laboratory from Room 5; passageway to Room 7

items.name: Emergency Generator Key
items.description: A key that may unlock the emergency generator outside.
properties: May be useful for accessing power
Slightly warmer temperature than the rest of the facility
Faint smell of disinfectant in the air

rooms.description: A large, dimly lit chamber filled with rows of old research equipment. The walls are adorned with diagrams and equations.
rooms.passages: Corridor from Room 6; passageway to Room 8

items.name: Old Research Equipment
items.description: A collection of old research equipment that may still be functional.
properties: May be useful for conducting experiments
Small storage room for equipment
Flickering fluorescent light overhead

rooms.description: A cramped control room filled with old computer terminals and dusty monitoring equipment. The walls are adorned with faded motivational posters.
rooms.passages: Laboratory from Room 7; passageway to Room 9

items.name: Old Control Console
items.description: A functioning control console that may still have some access to the facility's internal systems.
properties: May be able to hack into the system
Small storage room for equipment
Air conditioning unit humming in the corner

rooms.description: A large, dimly lit chamber filled with rows of old research equipment. The walls are adorned with diagrams and equations.
rooms.passages: Control room from Room 8; exit to the outside world

items.name: Old Research Notes
items.description: A stack of dusty research notes detailing experiments on the glowing creatures.
properties: May be useful for understanding the creatures
Faint smell of disinfectant and formaldehyde
Small freezer unit humming in the corner
